metadata.description: The word 'Luxury' is taken seriously by us. Distinguished by outstanding craftsmanship and timeless beauty, the rarity of these NFTs is platinum for a reason. This apartment is found at the heart of one of the most prestigious building in Dubai, the Paramount Hotel. Revel in elegance from a true Hollywood style perspective, we give you a themed suite influenced by the Paramount Picturesâ€™ talent for sophisticated design and creative entertainment. The amount of NFTs created for this luxury apartment is limited, own one and be a star.
metadata.name: Paramount Apartment #1

attributes.value: Apartment # 3310 Paramount hotel and apartment midtown. Al mustaqbal street. Business bay. Dubai
